mil.emp3.api.listeners

Interface IFreehandEventListener


  • public interface IFreehandEventListener
    A class must implement this interface to process freehand draw events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDrawError(IMap map, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      This method is called if an error is encountered.
      void onEnterFreeHandDrawMode(IMap map)
      This method is called when the map enters freehand draw mode.
      void onExitFreeHandDrawMode(IMap map)
      This method is called when the map exits free hand draw mode.
      void onFreeHandLineDrawEnd(IMap map, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoStrokeStyle style, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
      This method is called when the freehand line draw completes (the use lifted its finger).
      void onFreeHandLineDrawStart(IMap map, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
      This method is called each time a freehand draw is started.
      void onFreeHandLineDrawUpdate(IMap map, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
      This method is called each time a freehand draw is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onEnterFreeHandDrawMode

        void onEnterFreeHandDrawMode(IMap map)
        This method is called when the map enters freehand draw mode.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.

      • onFreeHandLineDrawStart

        void onFreeHandLineDrawStart(IMap map,
                           org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
        This method is called each time a freehand draw is started.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        positionList - The list of coordinates.

      • onFreeHandLineDrawUpdate

        void onFreeHandLineDrawUpdate(IMap map,
                            org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
        This method is called each time a freehand draw is updated.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        positionList - The list of coordinates.

      • onFreeHandLineDrawEnd

        void onFreeHandLineDrawEnd(IMap map,
                         org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoStrokeStyle style,
                         org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup positionList)
        This method is called when the freehand line draw completes (the use lifted its finger).
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        style - The style the line was drawn with.
        positionList - The list of coordinates.

      • onExitFreeHandDrawMode

        void onExitFreeHandDrawMode(IMap map)
        This method is called when the map exits free hand draw mode.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.

      • onDrawError

        void onDrawError(IMap map,
               java.lang.String errorMessage)
        This method is called if an error is encountered.
        Parameters:
        map - This parameter indicates the map the event occurred on.
        errorMessage - A text description of the error.
